arts.ttl: Livingston promoted to Scottish Premiership with comeback win at Ross County
arts.sum: Livingston fought back from two goals down to beat Ross County 5-3 on aggregate and gain promotion to the Scottish Premiership.

arts.ttl: Ross County relegated after Livingston produce superb comeback to gain promotion
